1: <pb/>A eb c'ajol Israel: a ton Rubén, Simeón, Leví, Judá, Isacar, Zabulón,
2: Dan, José, Benjamín, Neftalí, Gad c'al Aser.
3: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Judá: a ton Er, Onán c'al Sela. A is txutx eb oxwan ti', a ton xal is cutz'in Súa, aj Canaán xal. A Er tu', a ton is babel c'ajol Judá, caw wal yob is beybal, xan max c'aylay el yuj Jehová.
4: Axa ix Tamar, is yalib Judá tu', ay cawan yune' yetok cham: a ton Fares c'al Zera, xan owan bey is c'ajol Judá tu' yin masanil.
5: <pb/>A eb c'ajol Fares: a ton Hezrón c'al Hamul.
6: Axa eb c'ajol Zera: a ton Zimri, Etán, Hemán, Calcol c'al Darda. Owan eb yin masanil.
7: <pb/>A Carmi, a' ay is c'ajol Acar. A ton jun tu' max iontek yailal yiban conob Israel, tol max yitek juntzan tzet yetal xol tzet max yal Dios tol chi c'aylay el yin junelnej.
8: Axa is c'ajol Etán, a ton Azarías.
9: <pb/>Eb is c'ajol Hezrón: a ton Jerameel, Ram c'al Quelubai.
10: <pb/>A Ram, a' ay is c'ajol Aminadab, axa Aminadab tu', a' ay is c'ajol Naasón, a ton yajaw max yun xol eb yinatil Judá.
11: A Naasón tu', a' ay is c'ajol Salma. A Salma tu', a' ay is c'ajol Booz.
12: Axa Booz tu' a' ay is c'ajol Obed, a ton is mam Isaí.
13: A is babel c'ajol Isaí: a ton Eliab, yet is cab Abinadab, yet is yox Simea;
14: yet is can Natanael, yet is so' Radai;
15: yet is wak Ozem. Axa yet is suk xin, a ton David.
16: Yanab eb ti' xal Sarvia c'al xal Abigail. A eb yune' xal Sarvia, oxwan bey eb: a ton Abisai, Joab, c'al Asael.
17: Axa xal Abigail ay jun yune', a ton Amasa. A is mam Amasa tu', a ton Jeter ismaelita.
18: <pb/>Axa Caleb, is c'ajol Hezrón, ay jun is c'ajol yetok xal Azuba chi yik Jeriot. A juntzanxa is yune' xal: a ton Jezer, Sobab c'al Ardón.
19: Axa yet max cam Azuba, max yion pax Caleb tu' xal Efrata. Ay jun yune' xal, a ton Hur.
20: A Hur tu', a' ay is c'ajol Uri; axa Uri, a' ay is c'ajol Bezaleel.
21: <pb/>A yet ayxa Hezrón yin 60 abil, max mojay yetok is cutz'in Maquir, a ton is mam Galaad. Ay jun is c'ajol Hezrón yetok xal, a ton Segub.
22: A Segub tu', a' ay is c'ajol Jair. A Jair tu' ayoc yajawil yin 23 conob yul is makbej Galaad.
23: Axa pax eb aj Gesur, yetok eb aj Aram max ioncan is campamento Jair, yetok c'apax conob Kenat, c'al yetok yaldeail. A yin masanil juntzan tu' ay 60 conobal. Yinatil Maquir, is mam Galaad yayji masanil eb cajan bay tu'.
24: <pb/>Axa yet mayal camtok Hezrón bay Caleb Efrata, max jay yune' xal Abías yistzilben Hezrón, a ton Asur; a' ay is c'ajol Tecoa.
25: <pb/>A Hezrón, a' is babel c'ajol, a ton Jerameel. A eb is c'ajol Jerameel, a ton Ram is babel c'ajol, cax chi tit Buna, Orén, Ozem, c'al Ahías.
26: A Jerameel tu', ay junxa yistzil, a ton chi yik Atara, a jun tu' is txutx Onam.
27: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Ram, is babel c'ajol Jerameel: a ton Maaz, Jamín c'al Equer.
28: Axa eb c'ajol Onam: a ton Samai c'al Jada. <pb/>Axa eb is c'ajol Samai: a ton Nadab c'al Abisur.
29: A yistzil Abisur tu', a ton chi yik Abihail. A xal tu' is txutx Ahbán c'al Molid.
30: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Nadab: a ton Seled c'al Apaim. A Seled tu' max cam yin c'am yuninal.
31: Axa Apaim, a' ay is c'ajol Isi. Axa Isi tu', a' ay is c'ajol Sesán. Axa Sesán tu', a' ay is c'ajol Ahlai.
32: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Jada, is yuẍtak Samai, a ton Jeter c'al Jonatán. A Jeter tu' max cam yin c'am yuninal.
33: Axa eb c'ajol Jonatán tu': a ton Pelet c'al Zaza. A ton juntzan yinatil Jerameel ti'.
34: <pb/>A Sesán, c'am is c'ajol, asan is cutz'in ay, palta ay jun is chekbej chi yik Jarha aj Egipto.
35: Max yak' jun is cutz'in yistzilok nak tu'. A ix tu', ay jun yune' max yik Atai.
36: Eb is yinatil Atai yin txolilal: a ton Natán, Zabad, Eflal, Obed, Jehú, Azarías, Heles, Elasa, Sismai, Salum, Jecamías, c'al Elisama.
42: <pb/>A eb is c'ajol Caleb is yuẍtak Jerameel, a ton Mesa is babel c'ajol; a' ay is c'ajol Zif, axa junxa is c'ajol, a ton Maresa. A Maresa, a' ay is c'ajol Hebrón.
43: Axa eb is c'ajol Hebrón: a ton Coré, Tapúa, Requem c'al Sema.
44: Eb is yinatil Sema yin txolilal: a ton Raham, Jorcoam, Requem, Samai, Maón, c'al Bet-sur.
46: <pb/>A xal Efa, is cab yistzil Caleb, a ton is txutx Harán, Mosa, c'al Gazez. A Harán tu', a' ay is c'ajol junxa Gazez.
47: <pb/>Axa eb c'ajol Jahdai: a ton Regem, Jotam, Gesán, Pelet, Efa c'al Saaf.
48: <pb/>Axa Maaca junxa yistzil Caleb, a ton is txutx Seber, Tirhana, c'al Saaf. A Saaf tu', a' ay is c'ajol Madmana. A c'apax xal ay yune' Seva, a ton is mam Macbena, c'al Gibea. A Caleb tu', ay c'apax jun is cutz'in max yik Acsa.
50: <pb/>A ton juntzan ti' is yinatil Caleb: <pb/>A Hur, is babel unin xal Efrata, a' ay is c'ajol Sobal, a ton is yichmam eb aj Quiriat-jearim;
51: c'al Salma, is yichmam eb aj Belén, c'al Haref, a ton is yichmam eb aj Bet-gader.
52: <pb/>Axa eb yinatil Sobal is yichmam eb aj Quiriat-jearim: a ton Reaía, nanok eb manahetita,
53: c'al junjun makan eb aj Quiriat-jearim: a ton eb itrita, eb futita, eb sumatita, yetok eb misraita. A ton yin eb tu' max tit eb zoratita c'al eb estaolita.
54: <pb/>Axa eb yinatil Salma: a ton eb aj conob Belén, eb netofatita, eb aj Atrot-bet-joab, axa nanxa eb manahetita, eb zoraita,
55: yetokc'al junjun makan eb ajtz'ib max ec' cajay bay Jabes, chi yal elapnok, a ton eb tirateo, eb simeateo c'al yetok eb sucateo. A ton eb quenita ti' titnak yin yinatil Hamat, is yichmam eb recabita.
